verses.text: And the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* assembled \w together|strong="H6950"\w* at \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, and set \w up|strong="H7931"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* there. And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* was \w subdued|strong="H3533"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.

And there \w remained|strong="H3498"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, which had not yet \w received|strong="H2505"\w* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, How long \add are\add* ye \w slack|strong="H7503"\w* to \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you?

Give \w out|strong="H3051"\w* from among you \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* for \add each\add* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*: and I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* them, and they shall \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w go|strong="H1980"\w* through the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w describe|strong="H3789"\w* it \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of them; and they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add again\add* to me.

And they shall \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* it into \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w parts|strong="H2506"\w*: \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall \w abide|strong="H5975"\w* in their \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* on the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* shall \w abide|strong="H5975"\w* in their \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.

Ye shall therefore \w describe|strong="H3789"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add into\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w parts|strong="H2506"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add the description\add* hither to me, that I may \w cast|strong="H3384"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* for you here \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

But the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* have no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you; for the \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: and \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, have \w received|strong="H3947"\w* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* on the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them.

¶ And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and went \w away|strong="H3212"\w*: and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* them that \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to \w describe|strong="H3789"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* through the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w describe|strong="H3789"\w* it, and come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to me, that I may here \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* for you \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and passed \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w described|strong="H3789"\w* it by \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* into \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w parts|strong="H2506"\w* in a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \add again\add* to \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* to the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* at \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*.

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* for them in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and there \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* according to their \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w*.

¶ And the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: and the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of their \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* between the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.

And their \w border|strong="H1366"\w* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* was from \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*; and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* side, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* through the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*; and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* thereof were at the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w*.

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* from thence toward \w Luz|strong="H3870"\w*, to the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of \w Luz|strong="H3870"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*; and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Ataroth-adar|strong="H5853"\w*, near the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* that \add lieth\add* on the south \w side|strong="H5045"\w* of the \w nether|strong="H8481"\w* \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w*.

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* was \w drawn|strong="H8388"\w* \add thence\add*, and \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* the \w corner|strong="H6285"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*, from the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* that \add lieth\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*; and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* thereof were at \w Kirjath-baal|strong="H7154"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*, a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: this \add was\add* the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w quarter|strong="H6285"\w*.

And the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w quarter|strong="H6285"\w* \add was\add* from the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*, and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* on the \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w well|strong="H4599"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Nephtoah|strong="H5318"\w*:

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* that \add lieth\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*, \add and\add* which \add is\add* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of the \w giants|strong="H7497"\w* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*, to the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of \w Jebusi|strong="H2983"\w* on the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* to \w En-rogel|strong="H5883"\w*,

And was \w drawn|strong="H8388"\w* from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w En-shemesh|strong="H5885"\w*, and went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* toward \w Geliloth|strong="H1553"\w*, which \add is\add* over \w against|strong="H5227"\w* the going \w up|strong="H4608"\w* of \w Adummim|strong="H0131"\w*, and \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* of \w Bohan|strong="H0932"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*,

And passed \w along|strong="H5674"\w* toward the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w Arabah|strong="H6160"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, and went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto \w Arabah|strong="H6160"\w*:\f + \fr 18.18 \ft Arabah: or, the plain\f*

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* passed \w along|strong="H5674"\w* to the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of \w Beth-hoglah|strong="H1031"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*: and the \w outgoings|strong="H8444"\w* of the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* were at the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w bay|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* at the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: this \add was\add* the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w coast|strong="H1366"\w*.\f + \fr 18.19 \ft bay: Heb. tongue\f*

And \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* was the \w border|strong="H1379"\w* of it on the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*. This \add was\add* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, by the \w coasts|strong="H1367"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

Now the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* were \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, and \w Beth-hoglah|strong="H1031"\w*, and the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Keziz|strong="H7104"\w*,
And \w Beth-arabah|strong="H1026"\w*, and \w Zemaraim|strong="H6787"\w*, and \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*,
And \w Avim|strong="H5761"\w*, and \w Parah|strong="H6511"\w*, and \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w*,

And \w Chephar-haammonai|strong="H3726"\w*, and \w Ophni|strong="H6078"\w*, and \w Gaba|strong="H1387"\w*; \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:
\w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, and \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, and \w Beeroth|strong="H0881"\w*,
And \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w*, and \w Chephirah|strong="H3716"\w*, and \w Mozah|strong="H4681"\w*,
And \w Rekem|strong="H7552"\w*, and \w Irpeel|strong="H3416"\w*, and \w Taralah|strong="H8634"\w*,

And \w Zelah|strong="H6762"\w*, \w Eleph|strong="H0507"\w*, and \w Jebusi|strong="H2983"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w Gibeath|strong="H1394"\w*, \add and\add* \w Kirjath|strong="H7157"\w*; \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*. This \add is\add* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.
